<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of the Ash Puppet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2293)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 143 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 4,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This wand is composed of ash that has been compressed, shaped, and sealed with a clear lacquer. When you trace the wand's tip along a solid surface, it leaves a black trail of charcoal. Writing with the wand in this way never damages or wears the wand down.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast _disintegrate_. If the spell reduces a living creature to fine powder, you animate that creature's ashes into a [sulfur zombie](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1377) with the same general appearance as the disintegrated creature. You control this sulfur zombie, which gains the [minion](/Traits.aspx?ID=109) and [summoned](/Traits.aspx?ID=154) traits. You can issue a verbal command to the sulfur zombie as a single action with the auditory and concentrate traits. The sulfur zombie crumbles into inanimate ash when reduced to 0 Hit Points or after 1 minute, whichever comes first.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _disintegrate_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Wand of the Ash Puppet
